name: Sweet Dreams (josehzz)
description:
Lollipops are so delicious that you can't stop thinking about it, at night when dreams take over you can taste all the sweets you please, but the evil nightmares are going after you, avoid them and collect all the lollipops before its time to wake up!

Controls:

Mouse Left Click for menu buttons.

AD to move horizontally, W to jump.

Hold jump button to jump higher.
